org.educraft.block

Class CraftingTileEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity
      • org.educraft.block.CraftingTileEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrderingTileEntity

    public class CraftingTileEntity
extends net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity
    This tile entity contains the inventories required to maintain a block responsible for crafting. By storing the inventories in a tile entity, we allow multiple players to interact with the same inventory.
    See Also:
    BlockCalculator, BlockOrderingBench

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        public CraftingTileEntity initialise(net.minecraft.inventory.Container container,
                            int row,
                            int column)
        Set up the crafting matrix and the crafting result.

        We can't set them up in the constructor, because we don't have a reference to the container on creation. Should always initialise the tile entity as soon as we create the relevant container.

        Parameters:
        container - the container to link the crafting inventory to
        row - the number of rows in the crafting matrix
        column - the number of columns in the crafting matrix
        Returns:
        the initialised tile entity

      • getCraftMatrix

        public net.minecraft.inventory.InventoryCrafting getCraftMatrix()
        Returns the crafting matrix associated with this tile entity.
        Returns:
        the crafting matrix

      • getCraftResult

        public net.minecraft.inventory.IInventory getCraftResult()
        Returns the inventory used to hold the crafting result.
        Returns:
        the crafting result

      • getNumberOfUsers

        public int getNumberOfUsers()
        Returns the number of players currently interacting with the tile entity.
        Returns:
        the number of users

      • isBeingUsed

        public boolean isBeingUsed()
        Determines whether or not this tile entity is currently being used by anyone.
        Returns:
        true if the count of players is greater than 0

      • incrUsers

        public void incrUsers()
        Increases the count of players using this tile entity.

      • decrUsers

        public void decrUsers()
        Decreases the count of players using this tile entity.

      • isUseableByPlayer

        public boolean isUseableByPlayer(net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer player)
        Determines whether or not the given player is able to access this tile entity or not.
        Parameters:
        player - the player attempting to use the tile entity
        Returns:
        true of the player can use it, false if not
